title: Calendars of the World
text: WORK PROGRESS calcalr package implements algorithms book E. M. Reingold, N. Dershowitz “Calendrical Calculations - Ultimate Edition”, Cambridge University Press, April 2018

title: Calendars of the World
text: easiest way reckon time simply count days. Reingold Dershowitz chosen midnight onset Monday, January 1, 1 (Gregorian) fixed date 1, abbreviate R.D.1 1. R.D. fractional part giving time day called “moment”. noon day specified  + 0.5. calendars provide conversion functions /R.D. making possible convert one calendar one.
